Is the router configured to broadcast essid?
And after multiple samplings, you only see other essids?
Can you manually make the connection?
sudo iwconfig essid "My-Essid" ; sudo iwconfig key "my-key" ; dhclient wlan0
When you do  "sudo iwlist wlan0" is your LAN's essid not listed?
sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid "My-Essid" ; sudo iwconfig wlan0 key "my-key" ; sudo dhclient wlan0
I would suggest truning off encryption until you get it figured out.  It'll make things simplier.
